alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Inland Sarasota; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 6:41AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sumter, southeastern Pasco, western Hardee, Manatee, western Polk, eastern Hillsborough, northwestern DeSoto and north central Sarasota Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 641 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Zephyrhills North to 6 miles northeast of Lakewood Ranch. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Wauchula, Fish Hawk, Brandon, Medulla, Ona, Fussels Corner, Combee Settlement, Lakeland Linder Airport, Jan Phyl Village, Myakka City, Lakewood Ranch, Greater Sun Center, and Riverview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for south central, central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Inland Sarasota; Polk; Sumter
